description: Provides references to other Sources in a reference Source timeline
title: Source Timeline

source_id.description: The ID of the original Source being referenced.

timerange.description: The timerange where this item should be placed on the current Source timeline, as described by the [TimeRange](../schemas/timerange#top) type. Note that where temporal re-ordering is used, this refers to the presentation timeline.

original_timerange.description: The timerange from which the item should be drawn in the original Source, as described by the [TimeRange](../schemas/timerange#top) type. If omitted, assumed to match the `timerange`.
